Activity: Check the project dashboard for any overnight updates or alerts related to the EHR system.
Respond to any urgent emails or messages from stakeholders.
Meet with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to review any bugs or issues identified during testing of the EHR system.
Coordinate with @rn-1, @rn-2, and @rn-3 to gather feedback on the usability of the EHR system from a clinical perspective.
Prepare a summary of testing feedback and share it with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 for resolution.
Review the latest influenza trend analysis report and identify any anomalies or trends that need further investigation.
Meet with @his-2 and @mrs-1 to discuss data collection processes and ensure alignment with project goals.
Send a project status update email to all stakeholders, including @clinlead-1, @pchmp-1, and @ehrv-1.
Update the project documentation and prepare for the next day's tasks.
